none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on October 03, 2018 Description from Terminal Escape:
Late '90s ripping (and melodic) hardcore that kinda reminds me of ROUSE and early '90s Oakland, if only because it's fast as shit and still catchy. They fall off the rails a bit from time to time and it sounds like the guitarist might be more of a metalhead than the rest of the band but that's part of the charm (especially the tone that makes me think they just plugged a cheap ass distortion pedal straight into the mixing board).  SELF RELIANCE

seo.title: Self Reliance - Self Reliance demo - Terminal Escape
